channel.title: Auto cache loader PI help
channel.description: Hello i wanted to ask - i got a webclient map already and i whana to set cache auto downloading in dropbox. in which files i store the dropbox cache link? and what i have to do more still ?

item.title: Auto cache loader PI help
item.dc:creator: @David321 David321
item.description:
@David321 wrote:

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:2, topic:426164”]ugh. Theres a tut on this but I guess you need spoon fed.

Anyways. open a new .zip archive

Open your cache folder. DO NOT DRAG YOUR ENTIRE FOLDER TO THE ZIP FILE.

select all the files WITHIN the cache folder and drag them to your .zip

Next. open drop box and put the zip inside the “Public” folder.

Once it’s done loading, right click it go to drop box, and select the option that says “Copy Public URL”

Once thats done, open your client.java and search for the old cache link you had.

Now, open your CacheDownloader.java

near the top you will see two links, those are the old cache links. Now replace those with your new cache links.

Now its time to go to your signlink.java

Search for the cache name(before you started updating) and replace it with your cache name. IT IS CASE SENSITIVE.

So replace the old cache name with the EXACT name of your .zip archive.

Enjoy, most people aren’t as nice as me.[/quote]

Thanks but i got a problem. how i need to set it in my new archive? like files in archive or folder in archive? when i runned it showed downlaod , than loading cache library and rhen it shows error connecting please report. i am confused did i soenthing wrong or?

Read full topic

item.title: Auto cache loader PI help
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

ugh. Theres a tut on this but I guess you need spoon fed.

Anyways. open a new .zip archive

Open your cache folder. DO NOT DRAG YOUR ENTIRE FOLDER TO THE ZIP FILE.

select all the files WITHIN the cache folder and drag them to your .zip

Next. open drop box and put the zip inside the “Public” folder.

Once it’s done loading, right click it go to drop box, and select the option that says “Copy Public URL”

Once thats done, open your client.java and search for the old cache link you had.

Now, open your CacheDownloader.java

near the top you will see two links, those are the old cache links. Now replace those with your new cache links.

Now its time to go to your signlink.java

Search for the cache name(before you started updating) and replace it with your cache name. IT IS CASE SENSITIVE.

So replace the old cache name with the EXACT name of your .zip archive.

Enjoy, most people aren’t as nice as me.
